result.eng: I was cutting wood all morning.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag baint adhmaid ar feadh na maidine
result.orig: Bhí mé ag baint adhmaid ar feadh na maidine
result.html: Bhí mé ag baint adhmaid ar feadh na maidineI was cutting wood all morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag baint aḋmaid ar feaḋ na maidineI was cutting wood all morning.

result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.orig: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.html: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.html: Bhí mé ag baint féirI was cutting grass.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag baint féirI was cutting grass.

result.eng: They spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ga: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.orig: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.html: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.

result.html: Is deacair baint leisHe's very touchy.
result.ponchtml: Is deacair baint leisHe's very touchy.

result.eng: She started taking her clothes off.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.

result.html: Tá deacrachtaí ag baint leisThere are problems with it.
result.ponchtml: Tá deacraċtaí ag baint leisThere are problems with it.

result.eng: There are people who'd think the two things are related.
result.ga: Táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rud
result.orig: Táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rud
result.html: Táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rudThere are people who'd think the two things are related.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a ċeapfaḋ go ḃfuil baint idir an dá rudThere are people who'd think the two things are related.

result.eng: There's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
result.ga: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint as
result.orig: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint as
result.html: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint asThere's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
result.ponchtml: Níl luaċ saoṫair ar biṫ le baint asThere's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
